page.title: 13SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: {Women's Royal Voluntary Service.} Southminster W.R.V.S. is part of the Maldon W.R.V.S. organization. It runs a weekly{Trolley Shop}service at{ {Knightswood Old People's Home}and organizes a weekly{Luncheon Club}for the elderly of Southminster. It organizes a{Social Car Service}and there is an{Emergency Team}which can be called upon to help in emergencies. {The Maldon and District Crossroads {Care Attendant Sheme}covers the area from Bradwell to Tollesbury. Its aim is to help those who are caring for the disabled at home either by enabling them to have a break from their duties or by doing things for the disabled person which they are unable to do themselves. It will also help the disabled living at home on their own.Crossroads hope that if they wish, the disabled can stay at home.
